title: I Obtained a Stepmother. I Obtained a Little Brother. It Appears That Little Brother Is Not Father’s Child, but a Scum King’s Child, However, Don’t Mind It Please ( ´_ゝ`) - Novel Updates

description:
No engagements, no revenge, no villainess, no reincarnation, and especially no development.

It’s about the uninhibited Ellen repeatedly involving those around her into a slapstick comedy.

Basically a story that frequently gets sidetracked and a splendid plot that does not progress.

That is what “I obtained a stepmother….” is ( ´_ゝ`) -HikariAoi>
